# Tools
search - hits searxng with some custom categories for searching, got a list of URLS, and then pulled out the content using modern tooling, fallback to WebSearch / CURL. 
debate - used between agents to make / refute points in adversarial conditions, saves to mesh storage
spawn - instructions on how to use tx spawn / kill

# Capabilities
tangent - save distractions to a file so the main quest can continue
hive - spawn a bunch of little agents working on different tasks using tx spawn -n 30 -i input.md -m haiku

# Core / Brain
